title: Net Ghost Pipopa (Web Ghosts PiPoPa)
synopsis: About a young boy named Akigawa Yuta who gets sucked into a virtual world through his cell phone. He meets three strange creatures that travel with him on Yuta's adventure in this strange new world.
voices: ['Yabe, Masahito', 'Satou, Rina', 'Yahagi, Sayuri', 'Arai, Satomi', 'Shiraishi, Ryouko', 'Sasajima, Kaoru', 'Yonaga, Tsubasa', 'Ookawa, Tooru', 'Shimura, Tomoyuki', 'Gibu, Yuko']
staff: [['Yamakawa, Norio', ['Producer']], ['Kimura, Shinichiro', ['Director']], ['Suzuki, Iku', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Tamagawa, Makoto', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
